attributes.action: Teenagers should get a say in brexit!
attributes.background: We want to remain it's our future! Most of the votes to leave are by elderly people. The youth can not vote at all! It's the younger citizens future that will get affected. Therefore they should have rights to vote for their own future.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you would like teenagers to have a say in the Brexit process, but we are not sure at what age you'd like teenagers to be given the right to vote. 

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to lower the voting age to a specific age. 

You might also like to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234119
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234501
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229971
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/250538
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235503
